SEARCH
Package edu.wit.scds.ds.list.app

Enum Class Suit

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<Suit>
edu.wit.scds.ds.list.app.Suit
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Suit>, Constable
public enum Suit extends Enum<Suit>
An enumeration of card suits. (Listing C-2 of Appendix C.)

You may want/need to adjust the priorities for your game. As provided, suits are ordered by priority:

 Spades (highest) -> Diamonds -> Hearts -> Clubs -> none (lowest)
Version:
4.0, 4.1.0 2016-03-16
  • enhanced definition: added display name and graphic
  • added test driver main()
, 4.1.1 2021-11-19
  • fill in Javadoc comments
  • add Comparator/compare()
, 4.2.0 2022-11-06 add switch for standard vs alternate priority, 4.3.0 2024-03-26 Modifications for use for our game
Author:
Frank M. Carrano, Timothy M. Henry, David M Rosenberg, Your Name // TODO

  • Constructor Details

    • Suit

      private Suit(String suitDisplayName, String suitGraphic, String suitColor, int suitPriority, int altSuitPriority)
      Sets all fields representing a card suit
      Parameters:
      suitDisplayName - more esthetically pleasing for display
      suitGraphic - the 'standard' icon for the suit
      suitColor - the 'standard' color for the suit
      suitPriority - relative value/priority of the suit - used by compare()
      altSuitPriority - alternate relative value/priority of the suit - used by compare()
